definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
erhua variant of 兒媳婦|儿媳妇[er2 xi2 fu5]

sentences.english: Mrs…has never really got on with her daughter-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 老太太从未与儿媳妇儿真正和睦相处过。

sentences.english: Be attentive to the daughter or son in law.
It was true that old age had finally got her, as her daughter-in-law said.
sentences.chinese: 衰老的岁月确实终于找上她来，正如她的儿媳说的。

sentences.english: The mother-in-law ranted at her daughter-in-law about her fondness for eating and aversion to work.
sentences.chinese: 婆婆大声斥责儿媳的好吃懒做。

sentences.english: The son and daughter-in-law became irritated with the mess.
sentences.chinese: 儿子和儿媳妇为眼前的脏乱感到非常的恼火。

sentences.english: Mrs…and her daughter-in-law have never really got on.
sentences.chinese: 老太太从未与儿媳妇儿真正和睦相处过。

sentences.english: This was the third day he and his wife had spent in parks, looking.
sentences.chinese: 这是他和老伴来公园找儿媳妇的第三天了。

sentences.english: The rapport between the old lady and her daughter-in-law is good, and made them buy and sell stocks together.
sentences.chinese: 老太太和儿媳妇儿的关系很好，她们一起买卖股票。

sentences.english: How can the second daughter-in-law bring back wind in a paper?
sentences.chinese: 第二个儿媳怎样才能带回纸里的风？

sentences.english: How can the third daughter-in-law bring back music in wind?
sentences.chinese: 第三个儿媳怎样才能带回风中的音乐？

sentences.english: Old daughter-in-law was judge, new is vice president in law court.
sentences.chinese: 大儿媳过去是法官，现在是法院副院长。

sentences.english: The husband has passed away , if the daughter-in-law has had the duty supporting parents-in-law?
sentences.chinese: 丈夫去世了，儿媳妇有没有赡养公婆的义务？

sentences.english: I don't like living with my son and daughter-in-law. I feel like a?fifth wheel.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢和我儿子儿媳妇一起住，我觉得我很多余。

sentences.english: As time went by, there appeared an idea to marry Qinghe as the daughter-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 时间久了，就衍生出一个想法，娶青河做儿媳妇。

sentences.english: This is the only sunscreen both Iand my daughter-in-law can use.
sentences.chinese: 这是唯一一款我和我的儿媳可以一起使用的防晒霜。

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
erhua variant of 兒媳婦|儿媳妇[er2 xi2 fu5]
